settings.title: Full Suspension System
settings.description: Equipped with advanced shock absorbers that efficiently absorb impacts from gravel, potholes, and steep slopes. Stay in control with stable handling, enjoy a smoother ride, and confidently take on any terrain.

settings.title: Instant Power Boost
settings.description:
Mokwheel's advanced peak 1300 watts motor with

105 Nm of high torque delivers instant power for quick acceleration. Easily conquer steep hills with minimal effort.

settings.title: Extended Range
settings.description: The 940Wh battery delivers up to 80 miles of range. Equipped with a built-in BMS (Battery Management System) to stabilize power output and prolong battery life, ensuring reliable rides to farther destinations.

settings.title: Moves with Your Rhythm
settings.description: The torque sensor detects your every pedaling force and rhythm in real time, instantly adjusting motor output for precise power delivery. This creates smoother rides, better range, and a more natural feel.

settings.title: Shimano 8-Speed Derailleur
settings.description: The Shimano 8-speed system provides tackle hills, trails, and city streets, ensuring smooth shifting throughout your ride. Precision engineering optimizes pedaling efficiency to extend range while delivering consistent, natural cycling performance.

settings.title: Sunlight fuels your journey.
settings.description:
World’s first 1.6kg inverter with integrated 230W solar charging.

A mobile power station, powered by sunlight.

Powers 95% of your travel appliances.

Freedom rises with the sun.

Bring your lifestyle and rhythm with you.

Ride to the end of the horizon.

settings.title: LED HD Multifunction Display
settings.description: Ride data at a glance. Always ready to go — day or night.

settings.title: Pro 50mm Mid-Mounted Air Shock
settings.description: Absorbs rear wheel impacts to enhance control stability. Its progressive damping system ensures comfort on rough terrain while maintaining precise handling.

settings.title: 130mm Suspension Fork
settings.description: Extended 130mm travel exceeds standard forks, efficiently absorbing impacts from rocks, potholes, and steep drops. Navigate tough trails confidently with enhanced obstacle clearance and consistent control.

settings.title: Hydraulic Braking System
settings.description: The hydraulic brake delivers instant stopping power with precise modulation. Highly responsive lever feedback and smooth braking control ensure reliable safety. Whether you're flying downhill or rolling through traffic, they give you total confidence to stop on a dime, every time.

settings.title: Adjustable Seatpost
settings.description:
Height shifts with a tap. Comfort, fully in your control.

Freedom that answers to no terrain.

settings.title: Thickened Cushy Seat
settings.description: This seat provides plush support, built with extra-thick and high-resilience padding. Effectively absorbs vibrations on rough terrain while maintaining comfort during extended rides, eliminating fatigue.

settings.title: Ergonomic Grips
settings.description:
Keeps your posture natural.

Even on long rides, your body won’t protest.

settings.content: "The Mokwheel Obsidian is a great fat tire e-bike and will surely make its owners happy on its own. But it shines with the energy harvesting and sharing accessories that turn the e-bike into something special."

"The best part about Mokwheel is their soft seating with extra cushioning which helps the bum stay on the seat during a long ride which is the case most of the time with its range of 80Miles. The bike does weigh a bit so it is more suitable for people with a larger build, anywhere from 5’6″ ~ 6’8″."

"The size and up-right position take the Mokwheel Obsidian Electric Bicycle out of the mountain bike sphere. From uneven pavement to muddy gravel roads, However the bike is confidence inspiring anywhere it goes."

The Mokwheel Obsidian ST offers a pretty solid package for an all-terrain e-bike. The 1000W motor packs a serious punch, giving you plenty of power and torque for climbing hills and blasting down the road. The full suspension and stiff step-through frame make for a comfortable ride with easy access, especially on rougher trails.

As a power station ebike, the Obsidian ST offers the ability to charge your electronic devices on the go and harness solar energy for extended range. With its powerful motor, long range, adjustable suspension, and versatile design, the Obsidian ST is ideal for commuting. off-road adventures, and outdoor activities.
"Mokwheel strives to reach the hearts of consumers by offering exceptional products and services with honesty and transparency."

Mokwheel is known for their high-quality design, rugged frames, and powerful electric motors, making their bikes perfect for those who crave both adventure and performance. If you’re on the lookout for anelectric mountain bike deal, Mokwheel’s collection will exceed your expectations.

settings.title: Experience the Ride
settings.content: Be part of Mokwheel, and help us deliver the spirit of free riding to every street, every city.

settings.title: Partner with Mokwheel
settings.content: No amount of data beats a real ride. At our stores, you can feel the build, sense the power. Two legs. One bike. One short ride.

settings.title: Excellence in Care
settings.content: Our dealers are trained experts who can help by understanding your needs and guide you towards the perfect ebike along with answering any questions you may have.

settings.faqs_question: What type of riding is the Obsidian best for?
settings.faqs_answer: The Obsidian is a full-suspension, soft-tail electric bike built for off-road adventures. Its excellent traction and shock absorption make it ideal for trails, gravel, hills, and rugged terrain. It also performs well on long rides and daily commutes.

settings.faqs_question: What is a full suspension e-bike? How is it different from an ordinary e-bike?
settings.faqs_answer: A full suspension e-bike is equipped with a front fork and rear suspension system, which can absorb the impact from the front and rear wheels at the same time. It is more comfortable and stable on bumpy roads than models with only front suspension. It is especially suitable for complex terrains such as mountain biking, gravel roads, and downhill sections.

settings.faqs_question: Compared with other off-road electric bicycles, what are the advantages of Obsidian?
settings.faqs_answer: Obsidian integrates a 1300W powerful motor, soft tail shock absorber, torque sensor, eight-speed transmission system and professional-level brakes, taking into account performance, comfort and stability, and is particularly suitable for users who focus on control experience and road condition adaptability.

settings.faqs_question: What’s the difference between Step-Through and Step-Over electric bikes?
settings.faqs_answer: The main difference lies in the frame design. Step-Through bikes feature a lower or no top tube, making it easier to mount and dismount, while Step-Over bikes (with a higher top tube) offer greater frame rigidity, ideal for riders seeking sportier performance. The choice depends on your riding scenario and personal preference.

settings.faqs_question: Should I clean the Obsidian after riding? Does the suspension need maintenance?
settings.faqs_answer: It’s recommended to clean the bike after each ride, especially the chain, tires, and suspension areas. Avoid using a hose or high-pressure water, as it may damage the electrical components. Use a damp cloth to wipe the frame and a soft brush to clean hard-to-reach areas. For suspension, check the front fork and rear shock regularly for seal condition and lubrication. If you notice any oil leakage or reduced damping, contact customer support or a professional mechanic for servicing.

settings.faqs_question: What is the difference between Obsidian and Obsidian 2.0?
settings.faqs_answer: For specific differences between Obsidian and Obsidian 2.0, please refer to this introductory article.

settings.faqs_question: Do I need to install it myself?
settings.faqs_answer: The important parts are pre-installed when the vehicle leaves the factory. You only need to install the front wheel, handlebars, pedals and other parts according to the instructions and videos. You can also get help by contacting our after-sales team or offline stores.

settings.faqs_question: Can I purchase a Mokwheel electric bike in installments?
settings.faqs_answer: Sure! You can purchase any Mokwheel electric bike with affordable monthly payments through our trusted financing partners.👉 Click to view details.

settings.title: Took the bike on a long-distance ride, and it was perfect. The motor kept me going.
Dual suspension E-bikes redefine terrain, distance, and time. Took the bike on a long-distance ride, and it was perfect. The motor kept me going.
Took it through sand and forest paths-held traction beautifully. Mid-suspension soaked up tree root bumps.
Love the bike, great range and the motor really is just what I need, get a great workout but motor is great when I hit a steep hill or strong headwind very pleased with the bike. Highly recommend
Didn't think it would be so easy to ride up a hill, but this bike made it effortless. Power at the pedals and smooth handling all the way up.
